actions.command: execute if entity @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"witcheroriginaddon:alcohest"}]}] run give @s witcheroriginaddon:swallow_potion 1
execute if entity @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"witcheroriginaddon:alcohest"}]}] run playsound witcheroriginaddon:witcher_potion_refill neutral @a ~ ~ ~ 2 1

name: Refreshment
description: You can use Alcohest to refill your empty Witcher Potions at brewing stands.

badges.text: Active ability, use by pressing %s in range of a brewing stand with an empty Witcher potion in your mainhand.
Requires Alcohest, one is consumed on each successful use.
